alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:16PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN DAWSON COUNTY THROUGH 145 PM CDT... At 115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Willow Island, or 16 miles west of Lexington, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cozad and Willow Island around 120 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 213 and 227. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
